interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Magic Collection 3.5 Inch Wide Band Bonnet Elastic Band Black Review Date: 2020/11/01 Store: Magic Collection Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Magic Collection', 'Size': '3.5 Inch (Pack of 1)', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.39 x 4.88 x 0.59 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B07345F1BX_US', 'UPC': '636227221951'} Review Text: ☆Make SURE you wash this before wearing it. I did not and there were huge dye stains on my pillows. I ended up washing it... there was so much dye in the sink..the water was darker than this... like, Black when I started washing it. I was running water the whole time I was washing it so the water looks like a light purple but it didn.t start that way, the water was nearly jet black at first.
With that said,..I like the band around it..it.s big and spacious as well.

Update...i.ve had to wash it again and again as the stains were still getting on my white pillowcases. The dye for this thing is really strong as it doesn't wash out easily. It can.t be all that safe having that dye seep into your scalp which, seeps into your body/system.
I don.t sleep in it anymore...I just wear it during the day at home when I want my hair out of the way. I ended up buying a white one and that 1 works better for me. Review Title: Wash It Before Wearing! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

Great price. Awesome price. Susenstone20 pcs/set Makeup Brush Set (Gold2) {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '20', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Brass', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '644735066810'} I've had these almost a year and I use them just about every day and they're holding up really well.. They don't shed, haven't broken or stretched out of shape. I like them a lot. Love them. Dem Edges Tinted Edge Control (MEGA HOLD, BLACK) Dem Edges Tinted Edge Control {'Hair Type': 'Dry, Thin', 'Material Type Free': 'Alcohol-free,Oil-free,Paraben-free', 'Scent': 'Argan,Argan Oil', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'Dem Edges Tinted Edge Control', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.7 x 2.7 x 1.7 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DETEC', 'UPC': '652671101229 019962850936'} I am madly in love with this stuff. Works really really well in covering grays! LOOOOVE IT* OUTRE TIMELESS PINEAPPLE PONY - SWEETIE #950 Outre ['Outre Synthetic Hair Ponytail Timeless Pineapple Ponytail Sweetie', 'TIMELESS PINEAPPLE PONYTAIL', "Pick your curl pattern and get an instant curly updo with timeless Ponytail's Pineapple Drawstring. These curly puffs feature gorgeous curls that fall down your forehead for an effortlessly tousled look. Innovatively designed with a clip to attach to the front of your hairline, and a drawstring to attach to your hair, Timeless Ponytail's Pineapple Drawstring was made for the stylish woman on-the-go.", 'HOW TO WEAR', 'Brush your hair back into a high bun.', 'Brush your hair back into a high bun.', 'Attach the piece to your own bun, and pull the drawstring so that it is securely fastened.', 'Attach the piece to your own bun, and pull the drawstring so that it is securely fastened.', 'Extend the front of the piece forward and clip it just behind your hairline, so that the curls fall loosely down your forehead.', 'Extend the front of the piece forward and clip it just behind your hairline, so that the curls fall loosely down your forehead.', 'Fluff the curls, and go!', 'Fluff the curls, and go!', 'Tip:For a more voluminous look, pull your hair up into an even higher bun.', 'Tip:For a more voluminous look, pull your hair up into an even higher bun.'] {'Color': '950', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Outre', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 6 x 2.76 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '827298792451', 'Manufacturer': 'OUTRE'} ☆I.m not going to give it a low score just because i didn.t care for it. It looks as described and like the pic...i just didn't care for it for me. It looked more like a curly afro puff almost on me.
I like the bangs. If they made this in a body wave or thick curls, it would be nice also.
If this could be made in different textures and curl type it would be great.. it would give us choices. Not for me but you might love it. Long lasting Eyebrow pencil with Brown Brow Gel for Tattoo Eyes Makeup Fine Sketch Natural Hair-Like YRYM HT {'Brand': 'YRYM HT', 'Item Form': 'Gel,Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1 x 0.45 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '700401120498'} It.s like a marker not pencil. If you mess up and it dries it will not whipe off. You have to use soap or alcohol several times. You have to be very very light-handed for this or it.ll look crazy.
This needs to be made out of a pencil not marker and it.ll be nice. I didn't like that it.s a marker. Magic Collection 3.5 Inch Wide Band Bonnet Elastic Band Black Magic Collection {'Color': 'Black', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Magic Collection', 'Size': '3.5 Inch (Pack of 1)', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.39 x 4.88 x 0.59 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B07345F1BX_US', 'UPC': '636227221951'} ☆Make SURE you wash this before wearing it. I did not and there were huge dye stains on my pillows. I ended up washing it... there was so much dye in the sink..the water was darker than this... like, Black when I started washing it. I was running water the whole time I was washing it so the water looks like a light purple but it didn.t start that way, the water was nearly jet black at first.
With that said,..I like the band around it..it.s big and spacious as well.

Update...i.ve had to wash it again and again as the stains were still getting on my white pillowcases. The dye for this thing is really strong as it doesn't wash out easily. It can.t be all that safe having that dye seep into your scalp which, seeps into your body/system.
I don.t sleep in it anymore...I just wear it during the day at home when I want my hair out of the way. I ended up buying a white one and that 1 works better for me. Wash It Before Wearing!
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user remains focused on makeup tools, particularly eyebrow products like gels and pencils, and continues to explore hair care accessories. Their recent purchase underlines an interest in functional hair care items, especially those that manage hair effectively.
  
- **Aesthetic Choices**: They maintain a preference for sleek and sophisticated designs in silver and black with gold accents, ensuring a consistent aesthetic across both makeup and hair products.

- **Value Sensitivity**: Budget-conscious, the user seeks high-quality items at reasonable prices. Despite recent issues with a hair care product, they are open to experimenting with new styles and solutions.

- **Quality Expectation**: High standards are upheld regarding product performance. The user’s recent experience with dye transfer in hair accessories emphasizes the importance of usability and safety, potentially leading to more cautious selection in future purchases.

- **Inclusivity in Selection**: They prefer versatile products that cater to various skin tones and hair types, reflecting a commitment to inclusivity in their beauty and hair care choices.

- **Positive Engagement**: The user actively engages with products, providing candid feedback and evolving their routines. Their recent critical review highlights a discerning approach towards safety and usability in products while continuing to adapt their beauty regimen.

The profile illustrates a thoughtful consumer, committed to quality, aesthetics, and inclusivity, navigating budget considerations and evolving product expectations in beauty and hair care.
